mdRecord.dcterms:title: A topographical map of the northn. part of New York Island, exhibiting the plan of Fort Washington, now Fort Knyphausen, with the rebels lines to the southward, which were forced by the troops under the command of the Rt. Honble. Earl Percy, on the 16th Novr. 1776, and survey'd immediately after by order of his Lordship
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sauthier, Claude Joseph
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: New York (N.Y.)--History--Revolution, 1775-1783--Maps--Early works to 1800
